pylayers.signal.bsignal.FHsignal.unrex¶

FHsignal.unrex()[source]¶

extraction of the non redundant part of a real signal expressed in the frequency domain

>>> x = np.arange(0,6,1)
>>> y = np.arange(0,6,1)
>>> s = TUsignal(x,y)
>>> S = s.fft()
>>> U = S.unrex()
